mapper.sql: id, consultation_id, apply_hospital_id, apply_branch_id, apply_user_id, invite_hospital_id, invite_branch_id, invite_user_id, invite_user_price, invite_hospital_price, total_price, consultation_type, create_time, del_flag
mapper.insert:
insert into consultation_price_record (id, consultation_id, apply_hospital_id, apply_branch_id, apply_user_id, invite_hospital_id, invite_branch_id, invite_user_id, invite_user_price, invite_hospital_price, total_price, consultation_type ) values
((select replace(uuid(), '-', '') as id from dual), #{item.consultationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.applyHospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.applyBranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.applyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inviteHospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inviteBranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inviteUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inviteUserPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.inviteHospitalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.consultationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update consultation_price_record
consultation_id = #{consultationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_hospital_id = #{applyHospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_branch_id = #{applyBranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_user_id = #{applyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invite_hospital_id = #{inviteHospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invite_branch_id = #{inviteBranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invite_user_id = #{inviteUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invite_user_price = #{inviteUserPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
invite_hospital_price = #{inviteHospitalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
consultation_type = #{consultationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update consultation_price_record set consultation_id = #{consultationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_hospital_id = #{applyHospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_branch_id = #{applyBranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_user_id = #{applyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invite_hospital_id = #{inviteHospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invite_branch_id = #{inviteBranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invite_user_id = #{inviteUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invite_user_price = #{inviteUserPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, invite_hospital_price = #{inviteHospitalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, consultation_type = #{consultationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(cpr.id) afNumber, applybh.hospital_name applyHospital,invitebh.hospital_name inviteHospital, applyb.custom_name applyBranch,inviteb.custom_name inviteBranch, applyud.user_name applyName,inviteud.user_name inviteName, sum(cpr.total_price) price,sum(cpr.invite_user_price) otherPrice from consultation_price_record cpr left join apply_form af on af.id = cpr.consultation_id left join base_hospital applybh on cpr.apply_hospital_id = applybh.id left join base_hospital invitebh on cpr.invite_hospital_id = invitebh.id left join custom_branch applyb on cpr.apply_branch_id = applyb.id left join custom_branch inviteb on cpr.invite_branch_id = inviteb.id left join user_detail applyud on cpr.apply_user_id = applyud.id left join user_detail inviteud on cpr.invite_user_price = inviteud.id where cpr.del_flag = '0' and af.apply_status = #{status} and #{startTime}<af.consultant_apply_time <#{endTime} and af.apply_hospital_id = #{hospitalId} group by
cpr.apply_hospital_id
cpr.apply_branch_id
cpr.apply_user_id
cpr.invite_hospital_id
cpr.invite_branch_id
cpr.invite_user_id

select count(cpr.id) afNumber, applybh.hospital_name applyHospital,invitebh.hospital_name inviteHospital, applyb.custom_name applyBranch,inviteb.custom_name inviteBranch, applyud.user_name applyName,inviteud.user_name inviteName, sum(cpr.total_price) price,sum(cpr.invite_user_price) otherPrice from consultation_price_record cpr left join apply_form af on af.id = cpr.consultation_id left join base_hospital applybh on cpr.apply_hospital_id = applybh.id left join base_hospital invitebh on cpr.invite_hospital_id = invitebh.id left join custom_branch applyb on cpr.apply_branch_id = applyb.id left join custom_branch inviteb on cpr.invite_branch_id = inviteb.id left join user_detail applyud on cpr.apply_user_id = applyud.id left join user_detail inviteud on cpr.invite_user_price = inviteud.id where cpr.del_flag = '0' and af.apply_status = #{status} and #{startTime}<af.consultant_apply_time <#{endTime} and af.invite_hospital_id = #{hospitalId} group by
cpr.apply_hospital_id
cpr.apply_branch_id
cpr.apply_user_id
cpr.invite_hospital_id
cpr.invite_branch_id
cpr.invite_user_id
